data.message: Yo slim your washed up like some shit on the beach, your common sense is gone reality out of reach,  your 40 sum years old fucked up trying to preach, rapping about guns and now you're about reform who you think you're fooling when the fuck you think I was born,  get the fuck off the stage drop the mic you are through, go back to sucking dick yeah that's what you do, you're probably fucking high again walking around lit. don't even notice Hailey got hatchetman tatted on her tit. Next time you're on TV have something better to say, because we're making America great again get the fuck out our way! You had a fan in me yeah I thought you were cool now you're on stage supporting Kaepernick like a Fuckin fool! Don't worry man you'll never get another one of my deposits cause tonight Shady I'm cleaning out my closet!
